scripts.copy-vendor: mkdir -p dist/styles && cp node_modules/milligram/dist/milligram.min.css dist/styles/ && cp node_modules/normalize.css/normalize.css dist/styles/
scripts.copy-static: cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/favicon.ico dist/ && cp src/manifest.json dist/
scripts.copy: npm run copy-vendor && npm run copy-styles && npm run copy-sounds && npm run copy-img && npm run copy-static
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run compile
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run serve & npm run watch
